title: My First Closeread
text:
Hello World! Please read my Closeread story below.




Closeread enables scrollytelling.




Draw your readers attention with focus effects.







Highlighting

title: Top 100 Books
text:
In 2024 The Economist newspaper published the titles and average time to read each of the 500 top-rated books in english 1.
Their data journalists combined two datasets,
Here, we make the key graphic interactive, and explore results using ‘scrolly-telling’ via the R closeread package.
Scroll down to continue!
